entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 04:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -23.8°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
